ICR:RageStrike.NAME: Rage Strike
ICR:RageStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Increases by !M! when Bloodied.

ICR:AutoDefend.NAME: Auto Defend
ICR:AutoDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increases by !M! per channeled orb.

ICR:DragonStrike.NAME: Dragon Strike
ICR:DragonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Increases by !M! in Wrath or Divinity.

ICR:CraneWing.NAME: Crane Wing
ICR:CraneWing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increases by !M! in Calm.

ICR:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
ICR:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage twice, or thrice when Bloodied.

ICR:PowerAttack.NAME: Power Attack
ICR:PowerAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain [R] when Bloodied.

ICR:Paralyse.NAME: Paralyse
ICR:Paralyse.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses Strength equal to their Poison. NL Exhaust.
ICR:Paralyse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses Strength equal to their Poison.

ICR:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
ICR:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Lightning.
ICR:ChainLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel X Lightning.

ICR:Cyclone.NAME: Cyclone
ICR:Cyclone.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Frost and 1 Lightning.

ICR:FrostFall.NAME: Frost Fall
ICR:FrostFall.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Frost.
ICR:FrostFall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel X Frost.

ICR:HungryGhost.NAME: Hungry Ghost
ICR:HungryGhost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. Exhaust.

ICR:YinYang.NAME: Yin & Yang
ICR:YinYang.DESCRIPTION: When entering Calm, gain !M! Dexterity. NL When entering Wrath, gain !M! Strength.

ICR:Serenity.NAME: Serenity
ICR:Serenity.DESCRIPTION: Requires Calm. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL End your turn.
